DOC.brief_summary: The aim present study determine whether association respiratory problem dental caries child exhibit habit bruxism .
DOC.brief_title: Respiratory Problems Caries Children With Bruxism
DOC.detailed_description: Objectives : The aim present study determine whether association respiratory problem dental caries child exhibit habit bruxism . Method : Patient history take clinical exam perform 90 child selection allocation one two group . For determination bruxism , questionnaire administer parents/guardians oral clinical exam perform base criterion American Academy Sleep Medicine . Thirty-three male female child four seven year age participate present study - 14 child bruxism 19 child without bruxism . The data statistically analyze use chi-square test , level significance set 5 % ( p < 0.05 ) .
DOC.criteria: Children either complete primary mixed dentition dental treatment Children dental treatment
